name: Bomber Escape
description:
Escape the purple lava flow by blowing up blocks in your way and reaching the exit.

Controls:
WASD - move
Space - laybomb

You play as the white block. The objective is to get to the opening on the other side of the map while avoiding the purple lava. If the purple lava touches you, you lose the game. the lava periodically moves forward  and destroys everything in it's path
You can walk through bombs and the red explosion they create destory black blocks.
If you are hit by the red explosion you will be stunned for a few seconds.
